analyzed: 'phags pa gshin rje gshed dmar po'i sgrub thabs /
translated: The Means of Attaining Noble Red Yamāri

analyzed: gshin rje'i mgor bzhugs pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the one who sits on the head of Yama.

original: dang por re zhig sngags pas bde ba'i stan la nye bar gnas te /
analyzed: dang por re zhig sngags pas bde ba'i stan la nye bar gnas te /
translated: First, the mantrin should sit on a comfortable seat.

original: sgrub pa pos rang gi snying gar yi ge aam dmar po las nges par grub pa'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor rnam par bsgom par bya ba'o //
analyzed: sgrub pa pos rang gi snying gar yi ge aam dmar po las nges par grub pa'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor rnam par bsgom par bya ba'o //
translated: The practitioner should visualize a sun maṇḍala definitely accomplished from a red letter aṃ in his heart.

original: de'i steng du yi ge h'um dmar po rnam par bkod pas gshin rje gshed dmar po dang / bla ma dang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams mdun du dmigs la /
analyzed: de'i steng du yi ge h'um dmar po rnam par bkod pas gshin rje gshed dmar po dang / bla ma dang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams mdun du dmigs la /
translated: On top of that, by arranging a red letter hūṃ, he should visualize Red Yamāri and the gurus, buddhas, and bodhisattvas in front.

original: me tog la sogs pas legs par mchod cing phyag kyang 'tshal zhing gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba la sogs pa byas la stong pa nyid bsgom par bya ste /
analyzed: me tog la sogs pas legs par mchod cing phyag kyang 'tshal zhing gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba la sogs pa byas la stong pa nyid bsgom par bya ste /
translated: Having made offerings with flowers and so forth, he should also prostrate, go for refuge in the Three [Jewels], and so forth, and meditate on emptiness.

original: aom stong pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi rdo rje'i rang bzhin gyi bdag nyid ni nga yin no bar ro //
analyzed: aom stong pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi rdo rje'i rang bzhin gyi bdag nyid ni nga yin no bar ro //
translated: Oṃ. I am the nature of the vajra of the wisdom of emptiness.

original: de'i rjes la yi ge aam dmar po las skyes pa'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du yi ge h'um ngo //🔽de yongs su gyur pa las 'dzag pa dang ldan pa'i mgo bos mtshan pa'i @28a * //
analyzed: de'i rjes la yi ge aam dmar po las skyes pa'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du yi ge h'um ngo // de yongs su gyur pa las 'dzag pa dang ldan pa'i mgo bos mtshan pa'i @28a * //
translated: After that, on a sun maṇḍala arisen from a red letter aṃ, is a letter hūṃ.🔽That completely transforms into a white club marked with a skull dripping with blood,

original: dbyug to dkar po yi ge h'um gis byin gyis brlabs pa rnam par bsgom par bya ba'o //
analyzed: dbyug to dkar po yi ge h'um gis byin gyis brlabs pa rnam par bsgom par bya ba'o //
translated: consecrated by the letter hūṃ.

original: de dag rnams thams cad yongs su gyur pa las bdag nyid gshin rje gshed du rnam par bsam par bya ste /
analyzed: de dag rnams thams cad yongs su gyur pa las bdag nyid gshin rje gshed du rnam par bsam par bya ste /
translated: All of that completely transforms into oneself as Yamāntaka.

original: sku mdog dmar po g-yas bskum pa'i zhabs kyis gnas pa /
analyzed: sku mdog dmar po g-yas bskum pa'i zhabs kyis gnas pa /
translated: Red in color, standing with the right leg bent,

original: zhal gcig pa phyag gnyis pa'o //
analyzed: zhal gcig pa phyag gnyis pa'o //
translated: one face, two arms.

original: phyag g-yon pa na khrag gis yongs su gang bar gyur pa'i thod pa ste /
analyzed: phyag g-yon pa na khrag gis yongs su gang bar gyur pa'i thod pa ste /
translated: The left hand holds a skull cup filled with blood,

original: phyag g-yas pas ni mgo bos mtshan pa'i dbyug to bsnams pa'o //
analyzed: phyag g-yas pas ni mgo bos mtshan pa'i dbyug to bsnams pa'o //
translated: and the right hand holds a club marked with a skull.

original: dbu skra kham ser gyen du 'khyil ba 'dzag par gyur pa'i stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs dang ldan pa //
analyzed: dbu skra kham ser gyen du 'khyil ba 'dzag par gyur pa'i stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs dang ldan pa //
translated: His tawny hair swirls upward, and he is endowed with a tiger-skin skirt.

original: rang ltar snang ba'i shes rab ma rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa /
analyzed: rang ltar snang ba'i shes rab ma rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa /
translated: He is embraced by Prajñā, who appears like himself, and is endowed with various ornaments.

original: brkyang bskum gyi zhabs kyis gnas pa la 'khyud pa'i bdag nyid du bsgom par bya ba'o //
analyzed: brkyang bskum gyi zhabs kyis gnas pa la 'khyud pa'i bdag nyid du bsgom par bya ba'o //
translated: He is meditated upon as having the form of embracing with his feet extended and drawn up.

original: phyi nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs dkar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la yi ge h'um gis byin gyis brlabs pa ste /
analyzed: phyi nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs dkar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la yi ge h'um gis byin gyis brlabs pa ste /
translated: Then, the Blessed One is consecrated in the heart with the syllable hūṃ on a sun maṇḍala.

original: de yongs su gyur pa las 'dzag par gyur pa'i mgo bos mtshan pa'i dbyug to dkar pos mi g-yo bar rnam par bsgoms la /
analyzed: de yongs su gyur pa las 'dzag par gyur pa'i mgo bos mtshan pa'i dbyug to dkar pos mi g-yo bar rnam par bsgoms la /
translated: That completely transforms into a white club marked with a skull, which is meditated on as Acala.

original: de'i dbus su nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dmar po la gnas pa'i yi ge h'um kha dog dmar po rnam par bsgom par bya ba'o //
analyzed: de'i dbus su nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dmar po la gnas pa'i yi ge h'um kha dog dmar po rnam par bsgom par bya ba'o //
translated: In its center, one should meditate on a red syllable hūṃ, which is located on a red sun maṇḍala.

original: de nas gsang bar rdo rje dang yi ge h'um yongs su gyur pa las bcom ldan 'das kyi gsang bar padma 'dab ma brgyad pa la yi ge a'a: dmar po'o //
analyzed: de nas gsang bar rdo rje dang yi ge h'um yongs su gyur pa las bcom ldan 'das kyi gsang bar padma 'dab ma brgyad pa la yi ge a'a: dmar po'o //
translated: Then, in the secret part, the vajra and the syllable hūṃ transform into the secret part of the Blessed One, an eight-petaled lotus with a red syllable āḥ.

original: de'i rjes la sngags brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: de'i rjes la sngags brjod par bya ste /
translated: After that, one should recite the mantra:

original: aom de bzhin gshegs pa rnams thams cad kyi rjes su chags pa'i rdo rje'i rang bzhin gyi bdag nyid ni nga yin no //
analyzed: aom de bzhin gshegs pa rnams thams cad kyi rjes su chags pa'i rdo rje'i rang bzhin gyi bdag nyid ni nga yin no //
translated: “I am the nature of the vajra of passion of all the tathāgatas.”

original: de'i rjes la lte ba'i lkog tu cung zad dmar ba'i padma 'dab ma brgyad pa'i steng du yi ge h'um: dmar po 'bar bar gyur par bsam par bya ba'o //
analyzed: de'i rjes la lte ba'i lkog tu cung zad dmar ba'i padma 'dab ma brgyad pa'i steng du yi ge h'um: dmar po 'bar bar gyur par bsam par bya ba'o //
translated: After that, one should imagine a slightly red lotus with eight petals in the navel, with a red syllable hūṃ on top of it, blazing.

original: shes rab ma ni rgyags pas myos pa 'od 'dzag par dang ldan pa zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma bcom ldan 'das dang lhan cig mnyam par sbyar ba'i sbyor bas kun nas gnas pa'o //
analyzed: shes rab ma ni rgyags pas myos pa 'od 'dzag par dang ldan pa zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma bcom ldan 'das dang lhan cig mnyam par sbyar ba'i sbyor bas kun nas gnas pa'o //
translated: The wisdom woman is intoxicated with passion, dripping with sexual fluid, with one face and two arms, abiding in union with the Blessed One through the yoga of union.

original: de lta bur gyur pa'i gshin rje gshed dmar po ma hi rsha'i steng na sna tshogs padma la bzhugs par bsgom par bya ba'o //
analyzed: de lta bur gyur pa'i gshin rje gshed dmar po ma hi rsha'i steng na sna tshogs padma la bzhugs par bsgom par bya ba'o //
translated: One should meditate on the red Yamāri in this way, standing on Mahirṣi, and dwelling on a variegated lotus.

original: de ltar dam tshig la sogs pa rnams cho ga bzhin du 'gro bas thun tshod gnyis sam gsum mam bzhir bsgom par bya ba'o //
analyzed: de ltar dam tshig la sogs pa rnams cho ga bzhin du 'gro bas thun tshod gnyis sam gsum mam bzhir bsgom par bya ba'o //
translated: In this way, one should meditate for two, three, or four watches of the day, with the going and coming in accordance with the rite of the commitments and so forth.

original: aom a'am dr'im kham h'um ni @28b dam tshig byin gyis rlob pa'i sngags so //
analyzed: aom a'am dr'im kham h'um ni @28b dam tshig byin gyis rlob pa'i sngags so //
translated: Oṃ āṃ dhrīṃ kṣḥ haṃ is the mantra for the consecration of the commitments.

original: aom hr'i: bi kri t'a na na h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom hr'i: bi kri t'a na na h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /
translated: Oṃ hṛiḥ vikṛtānāṃ na na hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ phaṭ svāhā

original: rtsa ba'i sngags so //
analyzed: rtsa ba'i sngags so //
translated: is the root mantra.

original: aom ya m'a nta ka h'um /
analyzed: aom ya m'a nta ka h'um /
translated: Oṃ yamāntaka hūṃ

original: snying po'i sngags so //
analyzed: snying po'i sngags so //
translated: is the essence mantra.

original: 'phags pa gshin rje gshed dmar po'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so /
analyzed: 'phags pa gshin rje gshed dmar po'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so /
translated: The sādhana of Noble Red Yamāri is complete.

original: // / pandi ta aa bha ya'i zhal snga nas dge slong tshul khrims rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur ba'o//
analyzed: // / pandi ta aa bha ya'i zhal snga nas dge slong tshul khrims rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur ba'o//
